articles.title: Equestrian Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Draw Endless Stream of Visitors
articles.content:
Equestrian Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Draw Endless Stream of Visitors
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- An endless stream of people are visiting the equestrian statues of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il at the Mansudae Art Studio to pay tribute to them on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					The service personnel and people of the DPRK felt deep remorse for failing to erect even a single statue of Kim Jong Il in his lifetime in those days when they were overcome with the deep grief over his untimely demise.
					
					The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, taking the strong desire of all the service personnel and people into consideration, saw to it that the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il were erected at the studio.
					
					The studio was honored to have the statues erected before any others on the occasion of the first Day of the Shining Star last year.
					
					They have drawn more than 410 000 visitors of over 3 970 organizations over the last one year since their erection.
					
					They included senior party, state and army officials, veteran anti-Japanese fighters, service personnel and people from all walks of life, youth and students. They laid floral baskets, bouquets and flowers before the statues before paying tribute to them.
					
					Overseas Koreans and many foreigners also visited the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Military Attache Corps Visit Military Post on Mt. Taedok
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Visit Military Post on Mt. Taedok
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here on Wednesday visited the army post on Mt. Taedok on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the advancing of the slogan "A-match-for-a-hundred" by Generalissimo Kim Il Sung and the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					Members of the corps laid bouquets before the monument to the on-the-spot instruction of Kim Il Sung and made bows.
					
					They went round various places of the army post, being  briefed on the fact that Kim Il Sung advanced the historic slogan "A-match-for-a-hundred" 50 years ago, leaving immortal footsteps on the post for the strengthening of the revolutionary armed forces.
					
					They enjoyed an art performance given by service personnel of the post.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Pak Yong Ha, chairman of the Federation of Koreans in Australia, Choe Ryong Ho, vice-president of Yanbian University of Science and Technology of China, and Ri Yong Ho, managing director of the Dandong Shengmin Trade Co. Ltd., of China, and his party visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Wednesday. They laid bouquets before the statues and made bows. They arrived here to take part in the 17th Kimjongilia Festival.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Family of Chinese Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Martyr
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Family of Chinese Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Martyr
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a floral basket on Wednesday from the family of Zhang Weihua, Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Japanese Organizations, Figures
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Japanese Organizations, Figures
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un Wednesday received floral baskets from the Association for Promotion of Friendship between Japan and North and South Korea, Miyagi Prefectural Japan-DPRK Friendship Association, Takashi Nada, representative of the Ehime Institute for Contemporary Korean Issue in Japan, and Ekan Ikeguchi, high priest of the Saifukuji-Temple of Japan, on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Art Troupe of Koreans in Japan Gives Premiere to Celebrate Day of Shining Star
articles.content:
Art Troupe of Koreans in Japan Gives Premiere to Celebrate Day of Shining Star
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The art troupe of Koreans in Japan gave a music and dance performance "General Association of Korean Residents in Japan shines with blessing of sun" at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Wednesday to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					Put on the stage were such numbers as instrumental music and song "Glory to the General", narration and solo "In the Sky of February" and mixed duet "Song to General Kim Jong Il".
					
					The performers sang high praises of Kim Jong Il, who turned the socialist homeland into a dignified invincible power by devoting his enthusiasm all his life.
					
					They vividly showed the resolution to usher in a new heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan, true to the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, another peerlessly great man.
					
					Minister of Culture Hong Kwang Sun, officials concerned and people in the city enjoyed the performance.

articles.title: DPRK Ambassador to Bangladesh Appointed
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to Bangladesh Appointed
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Ri Song Hyon was appointed as the DPRK ambassador to Bangladesh, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.

articles.title: Anniversary of Victory in Islamic Revolution of Iran Feted
articles.content:
Anniversary of Victory in Islamic Revolution of Iran Feted
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Iranian Ambassador to the DPRK Mansour Chavoshi Wednesday gave a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club on the occasion of the 34th anniversary of the victory in the Islamic revolution of Iran.
					Present there on invitation were Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun, Vice Department Director of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea Ri Yong Chol and other officials concerned, diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations here.
					
					Members of the Iranian embassy were present.

articles.title: Reception Given for Art Group of Korean Schoolchildren in Japan
articles.content:
Reception Given for Art Group of Korean Schoolchildren in Japan
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un was so kind as to make sure that a reception was given at the People's Palace of Culture here on Wednesday for the art group of Korean schoolchildren in Japan who took part in the lunar New Year's performance. 
					Present there on invitation were the art group of Korean schoolchildren in Japan led by Choe In Thae, principal of Korean primary middle and high school in Ibaraki.
					
					Speeches were made there.
					
					The speakers said they were deeply touched by the profound loving care shown by Kim Jong Un, who is identical to the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who took deep care of the children of compatriots in Japan.
					
					They said that upon hearing the news of the third underground nuclear test, they were confident that no one can provoke the DPRK as long as there is Marshal Kim Jong Un, who is possessed of matchless pluck and grit.
					
					They evinced the resolution of the Korean schoolchildren in Japan to prepare themselves to be dependable successors to the patriotic cause of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), true to the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					A joint performance was given by the schoolchildren in Pyongyang City and members of the art group of Korean schoolchildren in Japan at the reception.

articles.title: Performances Given by Art Groups of Government Institutions
articles.content:
Performances Given by Art Groups of Government Institutions
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Performances were given by art groups of the commissions, ministries and national institutions at the Ponghwa Art Theatre and the Central Youth Hall on Wednesday to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					Put on the stage were choruses "Song of General Kim Jong Il" and "The General Will Live Forever as the Sun", mixed duet and pangchang "Attraction and Reverence", poem and story-telling and song "Yearning Is Boundless" and female quintet "Song of Love for People" and other colorful numbers.
					
					The performers sang high praises of the feats Kim Jong Il performed by providing an eternal foundation for prosperity on this land through his total patriotic dedication.
					
					Numbers including chorus "Snow Falls on Road Leading to Front" impressively dealt with truth that the dignity of the sun's nation is shining and the tremendous national power of Songun Korea could be demonstrated thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					Narration and chorus "Bonfire, Blaze Up", chorus "Ardent Desire", oungum ensemble "Let Us Become Roots" and female chorus "If Our Mother Party Wishes" reflected the resolution of the officials of the commissions, ministries and national institutions to make a breakthrough in the advance as engines and scouts exploring an untrodden road with Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's outlook on the people. 
					
					Among the audience were Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, vice premiers of the Cabinet and the chairperson of the Central Committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party, officials of commissions, ministries, national institutions and working people's organizations.

articles.title: Performance Given by University Students' Art Groups
articles.content:
Performance Given by University Students' Art Groups
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by students' art group members at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					Put on the stage were colorful numbers presented by students' art group members of Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Kim Hyong Jik University of Education, Kim Chol Ju University of Education, Pyongyang University of Architecture, Pyongyang Han Tok Su University of Light Industry, Pyongyang Jang Chol Gu University of Commerce, Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering, Pyongyang Teachers Training College and Pyongyang University of Railways.
					
					In numbers like poem and story "Cause of the Sun Will Be Everlasting" and female solo "Song of Love for People" the performers praised the revolutionary career and undying feats of Kim Jong Il, who defended the destiny of the country and brought into bloom the people's happiness, weathering the storm and stress all his life.
					
					Agitation and song "Bonfire, Blaze Up", guitar ensemble "Youthful Days of Fathers and Mothers" and group singing and story "Let Us Learn" gave deep impressions to the audience. They depicted the ardent desire of students to be talents who support the country with their youthful enthusiasm and wisdom.
					
					The performance showed well the revolutionary enthusiasm of students to demonstrate the might of the country shining as a satellite manufacturing and launching state as well as a nuclear weapons state by acquiring a wealth of knowledge. 
					
					Enjoying the performance were Choe Thae Bok, officials concerned and teachers and students of universities and colleges in the city.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthplace in Paektusan Secret Camp Visited
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthplace in Paektusan Secret Camp Visited
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp is visited by an endless stream of people on the occasion of his birth anniversary.  
					Among the visitors were service persons of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, exemplary primary information workers of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League from across the country, officials of many units including Ministry of Railways, Changgwang Public Service Management Bureau and Kim Jong Suk University of Education, youth and students. They are feeling strong yearnings for Kim Jong Il and pledging loyalty for the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					They laid floral baskets and bunches of flowers before the mosaic depicting the three commanders of Mt. Paektu in the secret camp and paid tribute.
					
					In the yard of the native home, they looked round historic relics, being briefed on the fact that Kim Jong Il was born and grew up in a log cabin.
					
					They held an oath-taking meeting before the birthplace.

articles.title: Kaeson Youth Park Tells of Kim Jong Il's Loving Care
articles.content:
Kaeson Youth Park Tells of Kim Jong Il's Loving Care
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The December 5, Juche 100 (2011), issue of the DPRK's leading newspaper Rodong Sinmun carried a picture of leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un smiling as bright as the sun when they visited the modernly-rebuilt Amusement Park in the Kaeson Youth Park.
					The weather was very cold that day, but Kim Jong Il spent hours going round the park, seized with joy all the time.
					
					To acquaint himself with the conditions of amusement facilities, he told officials to get on merry-go-round swing, triple giant stride, free fall and switchback.
					
					He also stressed the need to supply in time sufficient raw materials to the restaurants in the park so that they can run properly.
					
					He stopped at a mobile booth serving wheat cakes stuffed with meat to look into cake nutrients and price per cake.
					
					Kim Hyok, manager of the park, told KCNA:
					
					"That day, I told him I was afraid that he chose such cold day to visit the park.
					
					Then he said with laughter that he disregarded weather conditions for the sake of people's happiness."
					
					Prompted by his noble view of people, a number of recreation grounds and parks were fashionably built or rebuilt throughout the country, including recreation grounds in Mts. Ryongak and Chilbo.
					
					The people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are now sorely missing him, who dedicated all his life to the people's happiness, with the approach of the Day of the Shining Star (Feb. 16), his birthday.

articles.title: Meeting Held by Agricultural Working People
articles.content:
Meeting Held by Agricultural Working People
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Agricultural workers held a meeting at the plaza of the Party Founding Memorial Tower here on Wednesday to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					Present there were Ri Yong Su, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, officials of the Central Committee of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea and those in Pyongyang and agricultural workers.
					
					Ri Myong Gil, chairman of the Central Committee of the union, made a report. Then followed speeches.
					
					The reporter and speakers said: 
					
					Kim Jong Il rose as the shining star over Mt. Paektu. It was a great fortune of the nation which promised a rosy future of Juche Korea and an event which opened the bright prospect of the human cause of independence.
					
					Kim Jong Il demonstrated the dignity of the socialist country and performed the undying exploits on behalf of the era and history with intense loyalty to President Kim Il Sung and ardent love and patriotic devotion to the country and its people.
					
					The revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il is a heroic epic of a peerlessly brilliant commander of Songun and matchless patriot who consolidated the defence capabilities of the country in every way and firmly defended socialism, holding aloft the banner of Songun.
					
					They said that all the agricultural workers should hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean revolution and thoroughly carry out his behests.

articles.title: Ice Sculpture Festival Held in DPRK
articles.content:
Ice Sculpture Festival Held in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- An ice sculpture festival started in Samjiyon township and the area of the Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp on Tuesday in celebration of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					On display there were thousands of ice sculptures created by inhabitants in Samjiyon County and members of the Ministry of People's Security group under the 618 Construction Shock Brigade.
					
					Among them are sculptures depicting Jongil Peak imposingly standing in defense of the birthplace, Kimjongilia, big celebration lantern and vase which reflected deep reverence of the DPRK army and people for Kim Jong Il.
					
					There were also sculptures depicting a green pine on Nam Hill and two pistols, the Marshal's star on the Supreme Commander's flag, satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2, Changjon Street, Pyongyang Folklore Park and Rungna Dolphinarium. They left deep impressions on the visitors.
					
					Some sculptures portrayed people who are full of enthusiasm to boost production in all fields and units of the national economy in hearty response to the New Year Address made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					A variety of lighting methods were applied to suit the characteristics of ice sculptures, adding to the aesthetic value of each piece.
					
					The ice sculpture festival is visited by many inhabitants in the county and other people every day.

articles.title: Preparations for International Martial Arts Games Brisk
articles.content:
Preparations for International Martial Arts Games Brisk
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Preparations for the 5th International Martial Arts Games have gained momentum.
					A delegation of the International Martial Arts Games Commission led by its secretary general toured Indonesia and other nations a year before to discuss issues related to organizing the games.
					
					The Australia Organizing Committee has stepped up preparations for sponsoring the games.
					
					A website for the games was opened and martial arts competitions took place in the Philippines, Greece and other countries as part of preparations for the 5th International Martial Arts Games.
					
					Meanwhile, the Executive Committee of the International Martial Art Games Commission met in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, some time ago to discuss a series of issues for successfully holding the games, amendments and supplements of the games regulations and enrollment of new members in the commission.
					
					The 5th Games is to be held in Australia in May this year.

articles.title: DPRK People Seized with Joy over Successful Nuclear Test
articles.content:
DPRK People Seized with Joy over Successful Nuclear Test
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The 3rd underground nuclear test, successfully conducted by the DPRK on Tuesday, has greatly encouraged local people.
					"The nuclear test is a self-defensive measure which is not contrary to any international law," Cha Jong Chol, an officer of the Korean People's Army, told KCNA.
					
					He said:
					
					"It was a just action to defend peace and stability in and around the Korean Peninsula.
					
					The DPRK now boasts of its self-defensive nuclear deterrent, invincible army and single-minded unity, which were provided thanks to the tireless efforts of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					The anti-DPRK hostile forces are crying for vessel inspections and maritime blockade as part of sanctions over its satellite launch and nuclear test. Their moves remind one of a new-born puppy knowing no fear of a tiger.
					
					The days had gone never to return when the U.S. threatened the DPRK with A-bombs."
					
					Han Chol Min, a war veteran living in Pothonggang District, Pyongyang City, said:
					
					"I am old, but the same spirit is still alive as I had in fighting the Yankees in Osan area during the Fatherland Liberation War (1950-1953).
					
					It is quite natural to counter the U.S. undisguised nuclear threat with powerful deterrent.
					
					The more reckless the U.S.-led imperialists go to isolate and stifle the DPRK, the stronger the DPRK people's will to defend its socialist idea and social system will grow.
					
					Now I am ready to take part in an all-out action for national reunification with arms in my hand, once Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un gives an order. This is what is in mind of all the war veterans."

articles.title: DPRK People Hail Successful Nuclear Test
articles.content:
DPRK People Hail Successful Nuclear Test
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea on Feb. 12 conducted the third underground nuclear test with success.
					The test has enjoyed full support from local people.
					
					Ji Kang Ju, a man living in Hyesan City, Ryanggang Province, told KCNA:
					
					"The successful nuclear test again displayed the vitality of the Songun (military-first) politics pursued by the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					It represented the might of Songun Korea, which is emerging a full-fledged thriving nation."
					
					O Sol Hwa, a woman residing in Yomju County, North Phyongan Province, said:
					
					"The test is an epoch-making event brought by the iron-willed courage and far-sighted sagacity of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					The feats he performed to bolster up the nation's self-reliant military capabilities will remain long in the nation's history."
					
					Ri Se Gwang, a young man living in Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province, said:
					
					"The DPRK's nuclear test was successfully conducted by its own technologies, which gives a glimpse of its daring spirit."
					
					Ra Hye Ran, a woman living in the same city, said:
					
					"The DPRK's nuclear test is a just self-defensive step taken to cope with the U.S. and its followers' hostile policy and military threats.
					
					It is impudent for the world's biggest nuclear weapons states to criticize other countries' efforts to have access to nukes as a 'threat to global peace.'
					
					The DPRK's nuclear deterrent serves as a powerful means to defend the country's sovereignty and dignity, its people's freedom and happiness and peace and security in the region."

articles.title: DPRK People Rejoice at Successful Nuclear Test
articles.content:
DPRK People Rejoice at Successful Nuclear Test
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- People in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are now seized with joy over its successful third nuclear test.
					They call the test an "auspicious event", "satisfied news" and "sweeping victory".
					
					In this regard, KCNA had interviews with citizens at a bus stop in Central District, Pyongyang.
					
					Ri Myong Song, a 33-year-old man living in Munsu-dong No.3, Taedonggang District, said:
					
					"I am very excited to hear the news about the nuclear test.
					
					Our country fully demonstrated its might by successfully conducting the test on a higher level than the previous ones.
					
					The test represents the DPRK's sweeping victory over the U.S., which wantonly encroached upon its legitimate right to satellite launch for peaceful purposes." 
					
					O Jong Suk, a 54-year-old woman residing in Munsin-dong No.1, Tongdaewon District, said:
					
					"The test served as a sledgehammer to the U.S.-led hostile forces who cooked up UN Security Council 'resolution on sanctions' against the DPRK over its satellite launch for peaceful purpose.
					
					There is a limit to our patience. I fully support the government's stand that it would be left with no option but to take the second and third stronger steps in succession if the U.S. takes a hostile approach toward the DPRK to the last."

articles.title: DPRK Will Defend Security and Sovereignty of Nation to Last: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
DPRK Will Defend Security and Sovereignty of Nation to Last: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's scientists in the field of national defence successfully conducted the third underground nuclear test.
					The success in the explosion test of a smaller and lighter A-bomb makes it possible for the country to bolster up its physical deterrent capable of foiling any aggression moves of the enemies at one blow.
					
					The nuclear deterrent that has been bolstered up represents a just cause for defending the security and sovereignty of the country and nation as it is part of the practical measures taken by the DPRK to cope with the U.S. hostile policy toward it.
					
					For over half a century since early in the 1950s the U.S. has turned south Korea into the biggest nuclear arsenal in the Far East, gravely threatening the DPRK through ceaseless maneuvers for a nuclear war. It has worked hard to deprive the DPRK of its sovereignty and its right to exist and develop publicly recognized by international law, thereby doing tremendous damage to its socialist economic construction and the improvement of the standard of people's living.
					
					The U.S. found fault with the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes while shielding the south Korean puppet forces' satellite launch. Such application of double standards is seriously hindering the DPRK's development.
					
					The U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK is increasing the danger of a war on the Korean Peninsula day by day and putting global peace and security at peril.
					
					All facts prove that the DPRK's measure to bolster up its nuclear deterrent is the most just step for shattering the aggression moves of the U.S. and defending peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and in Northeast Asia and, furthermore, in the rest of the world.
					
					The U.S. and its allies are vociferating about international "reaction", again taking issue with the DPRK's underground nuclear test as a "provocation".
					
					With no desperate efforts can the U.S. shake the faith and will of the army and people of the DPRK and their resolution to wage a battle against the U.S. and wipe out enemies.
					
					The DPRK will firmly defend the security and sovereignty of the country and nation from the U.S. hostile policy and arbitrary practices.

articles.title: Provocateurs Should Be Responsible for Crisis on Korean Peninsula: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Provocateurs Should Be Responsible for Crisis on Korean Peninsula: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Hostile forces are escalating their provocations against the DPRK, a sovereign state, over its satellite launch for peaceful purposes. 
					They are busy creating atmosphere for increased pressure after the adoption of the UN Security Council's "resolution on sanctions", unhesitatingly making armed blackmail against the DPRK. 
					
					The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces are vying with each other to vociferate about what they call "crucial measure". Some time ago, they staged joint naval exercises in the East Sea of Korea with the U.S. nuclear submarine San Francisco equipped with Tomahawk cruise missiles and Aegis cruiser and more than 10 warships of the south Korean puppet navy and antisubmarine patrol planes involved.
					
					San Francisco was deployed in the waters off the Korean Peninsula in 1994 when the standoff between the DPRK and the U.S. was most acute. Its reappearance in the waters off south Korea 19 years later brought to light the provocative scenario of the hostile forces to bring back the situation on the peninsula to a dangerous line.
					
					They are crying out for "stronger reaction," claiming that "simple joint exercises are impossible to break the will of the north for provocations." 
					
					The U.S. transferred two B-2 Stealth bombers to Guam from its mainland base to strike the nuclear test ground and military facilities of the DPRK. The south Korean regime is busy developing ballistic missile with a range of 800km to be deployed for actual battle earlier than scheduled.
					
					This is a blatant challenge to the international community concerned about the grave political and military situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula at present and an open act of aggression to stifle the DPRK. 
					
					As proved by the facts, the root cause of the tension on the peninsula is not the satellite launch of the DPRK. 
					
					It is attributable to the hostile policy and war policy of the forces which cry out for even a military counteraction over the DPRK's exercise of its legitimate right to space development for peaceful purposes. 
					
					They have regarded the DPRK confidently advancing along the road of independence, refusing to meekly obey them, as a thorn in their flesh. They have never dropped their scenario to bring down the social system in the DPRK. 
					
					All their hostile acts against the DPRK over its satellite launch are part of their unceasing moves to stifle it. This indicates that their moves have reached a full-scale alarming phase. 
					
					They are holding the DPRK responsible for the "tension" and "regional arms race," taking issue with its satellite launch. But, it is nothing but a fig-leaf to cover up their war policy. 
					
					The situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula at present is so serious that even a slight accidental case may lead to an all-out war which can disturb the whole region. 
					
					Those provocateurs should behave themselves. 
					
					The army and people of the DPRK are filled with will to meet all blatant challenges of the hostile forces and defend its dignity and sovereignty. 
					
					If they run amuck recklessly, misinterpreting the will of the DPRK to defend its sovereignty, its counteraction will be beyond imagination. The provocateurs will be wholly accountable for the ensuing consequences.

articles.title: U.S. Talk about "Rebalance" in Asia-Pacific under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Talk about "Rebalance" in Asia-Pacific under Fire
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- There is a dangerous military movement of the U.S. in the Asia-Pacific region under the pretext of "rebalance" there.
					Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a bylined article in this regard:
					
					The theory of "rebalance" much touted by the U.S. precisely means a call for beefing up its armed forces in the region.
					
					The U.S. imperialists' pivot to Asia-Pacific strategy is sparking off protest from the world people.
					
					Under this situation the U.S. is asserting that whether to ensure peace in the region or not depends on maintaining "rebalance". This is prompted by its intention to deter the world people from directing the spearhead of their struggle for defending peace to opposing its war policy.
					
					It is also aimed at laying a military siege to its neighboring countries in the region by massively beefing up its armed forces.
					
					Through this the U.S. seeks to bar those countries from joining in the arms race and step up the formation of the siege to the region.
					
					It is the principal objective of the U.S. to mount a preemptive strike at the DPRK.
					
					The U.S. is working hard to bring the DPRK to its knees and force it to lower its socialist flag through aggression and war 
					
					It is sophism for the U.S. to claim that peace is ensured in the region because of the "balance" preserved there by the U.S. imperialist aggression forces. But it is thanks to the relentless struggle for peace against war and tremendous war deterrence of the DPRK that a new war has not broken out so far.
					
					It is a foolish daydream for the U.S. war-like forces to dare invade the DPRK, which has always kept to the road of Songun to cope with the situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Regime Accused of Its Fascist Actions against Pro-reunification Patriots
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Regime Accused of Its Fascist Actions against Pro-reunification Patriots
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in south Korea on Feb. 8 staged a trial of Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, at which it sentenced him to four years in prison and four years of suspension of qualification on charges of the violation of the notorious "Security Law". Ro Su Hui visited Pyongyang to express condolences over the great loss to the nation.
					Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard: 
					
					This is a brutal action which could be taken only by the worst traitors forsaken by the country and nation and fascist hangmen busy with anti-reunification acts and confrontation with fellow countrymen and human rights abuses. It is another blatant challenge to the DPRK. 
					
					The Lee group took harsh legal actions against Ro Su Hui and other members of the reunification movement organizations who conducted praiseworthy activities for national reconciliation, unity and reunification. They  are aimed at creating a terror-ridden atmosphere of suppression in south Korea to chill the desire for achieving reunification through alliance with the north  daily mounting among people from all walks of life, inciting confrontation with fellow countrymen and realizing its ambition for invading the north at any cost. 
					
					Driven into a bottomless abyss of ruin for committing unpardonable anti-reunification crimes against the nation, the Lee group desperately seeks a way out of it in stepping up the war moves against the DPRK and intensifying the suppression of progressive forces. 
					
					The Lee group is the worst tyrant and enemy of the nation as it indiscriminately cracks down upon the patriots, who devoted themselves to national concord and reunification, on the charge of violation of the fascist SL which should have been thrown into the dustbin of history.
					
					All Koreans will never pardon such traitors as Lee Myung Bak but mete out the severest punishment to them.

articles.title: Actions for Peace against U.S., War Called for
articles.content:
Actions for Peace against U.S., War Called for
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea on Feb. 10 issued an appeal titled "Let's defend peace from sanctions, war and U.S."
					The U.S. "sanctions" racket against the DPRK has created an emergency situation on the Korean Peninsula in which a war is unavoidable and a serious danger of a nuclear war, the appeal said, adding:
					
					The south Korean authorities are not hiding their scenario for a preemptive strike at the DPRK while the U.S. is amassing lots of nukes in the vicinity of the Korean Peninsula and the waters off south Korea to be ready for an actual war.
					
					The U.S. is busy with its high-handed "sanctions" racket over the north's satellite launch recognized by itself. This is promoted by its intention to save its economy and hegemonic policy from bankruptcy.
					
					The Lee Myung Bak regime is busy escalating "sanctions" under the prevailing situation in which a crisis has occurred due to the U.S. This cannot be construed otherwise than a very dangerous development.
					
					It is hard to expect peace unless the U.S. "sanctions" are opposed and stopped.
					
					The Lee regime and the "Saenuri Party" should stop at once the discussion on the issue of joining in the "sanctions" and slapping additional "sanctions." 
					
					All the political camp, civic and public organizations and people desirous of peace should wage a powerful struggle for peace against war with the will to oppose the U.S. "sanctions against the north" and war.
					
					It is the only way to struggle for frustrating all the U.S. actions and war moves.
					
					There would be no peace without actions against "sanctions", war and the U.S.
					
					Let us all get united in the struggle for defending peace from the U.S. and war!

articles.title: S. Korean Court Accused of Its Unreasonable Judgment
articles.content:
S. Korean Court Accused of Its Unreasonable Judgment
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The European Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) issued a statement on Feb. 8 denouncing a south Korean court for its unreasonable judgment passed on leading members of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon.
					The statement recalled that the Seoul Central District Court in south Korea on the same day sentenced the vice-chairman and the secretary general of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon to heavy penalties on charges that they threatened the security of the community.
					
					We can never recognize the ruling made by invoking the "Security Law", an evil law against human rights, the statement noted.
					
					How do the condolatory visit to share the sorrow with the compatriots who suffered the greatest loss and the action taken to defuse the danger of war constitute a threat to the security of the community, it queried.
					
					We will never tolerate the Lee Myung Bak group, the group of  the  worst sycophants and traitors keen to see its office come to an end by stepping up its confrontation policy against the DPRK, reunification and the nation, it declared, urging the south Korean authorities to abolish the "Security Law" and set free all the arrested pro-reunification patriots.

articles.title: Friendly Gathering for Celebrating Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Held in China
articles.content:
Friendly Gathering for Celebrating Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Held in China
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- A friendly gathering for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il was held in Beijing on February 2 under the co-sponsorship of the Jindallae Children's Foundation and the Public Center for Diplomatic and Cultural Exchange of China.
					Present there were personages of the foundation, the Arab Information Center in China and the Public Center for Diplomatic and Cultural Exchange of China and other people.
					
					Present there on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to China and staff members of his embassy and officials of units working in Beijing.
					
					The chairperson of the foundation said that Kim Jong Il was a great leader and a great man who dedicated all his life to the prosperity of the country and the cause of global independence.
					
					Kim Jong Il is always remembered in the hearts of not only the Korean people but all other progressive people, she noted.
					
					She was convinced that the Korean people would surely build a thriving socialist nation desired by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il under the guidance of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					The executive chairman of the Public Center for Diplomatic and Cultural Exchange of China referred to the fact that Kim Jong Il developed the Workers' Party of Korea into a tested, seasoned and invincible party and turned the DPRK into a political, ideological and military power.
					
					The chairman of the Arab Information Center in China noted that Kim Jong Il is alive in the hearts of all people for his great exploits for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence.
					
					Kim Jong Un, who is possessed of modest and unassuming personality and strong will and faith, will carry forward the idea and cause of Kim Jong Il and accomplish without fail the revolutionary cause of Juche started by Kim Il Sung, he added.

articles.title: Great Life and Exploits of Kim Jong Il Remembered by Foreigners
articles.content:
Great Life and Exploits of Kim Jong Il Remembered by Foreigners
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Personages of Myanmar, Egypt and Kuwait made public statements from Feb. 1 to 5 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					Aung Thein Lynn, member of the Central Executive Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, said that Kim Jong Il, who successfully carried forward the cause of President Kim Il Sung, thoroughly applied the idea of the President to the revolution and construction, developing the Workers' Party of Korea, state and army into those of the President and putting the dignity of the nation and national power on the highest level.
					
					Tin Tun, director of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute, noted that Kim Jong Il underwent all difficulties, which no one experienced, for prosperity of the country and happiness of its people and passed away on a train while making a tourney for field guidance till the last moments of his life.
					
					Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, chairman of the Egyptian Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said: Kim Jong Il is alive in the hearts of us as he defended the peace in Asia and the rest of the world and led progressives with the treasured sword of justice and invincible Songun politics.
					
					Yousfe Al Amiri, chairman of the Kuwait-DPRK Friendship Association, said that Kim Jong Il successfully led the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence by creditably carrying forward the independent idea and line of Kim Il Sung.
					
					Thanks to the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il the DPRK turned into an invincible political and military power, an impregnable fortress in which the leader, party, army and people form a harmonious whole, the chairman stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in China
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" was brought out in pamphlet by the Dandong Longshan Printing House of China on Feb. 6.
					The work, made public on April 6, 2012, clarifies that it is a principled requirement for victoriously advancing the cause of the Korean revolution to eternally hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					It also indicates the tasks to be fulfilled to steadily develop the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Speech at 4th Meeting of Cell Secretaries of WPK Carried by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Speech at 4th Meeting of Cell Secretaries of WPK Carried by Foreign Papers
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) --The dear respected Kim Jong Un's speech at the 4th Conference of Cell Secretaries of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) was carried by the Nepali papers Arpan, Weekly Mirror and Nepal News and posted on the website of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy between February 6 and 8.
					The papers and website were illustrated with his photos.

articles.title: Egyptian Political Figure Supports DPRK's Principled Stand
articles.content:
Egyptian Political Figure Supports DPRK's Principled Stand
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Wahid Al Uksouri, chairman of the Arab Socialist Party of Egypt, made public a statement on January 31 in support of the principled stand of the DPRK.
					The statement said:
					
					A touch-and-go situation is prevailing on the Korean Peninsula due to the U.S. and its allies' hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					In this regard the DPRK clarified in the strong terms in a series of statements its principled and resolute stand to counter all forms of aggression and moves to stifle it.
					
					Our party valuing relations with the Workers' Party of Korea and the friendly Korean people is closely watching with deep concern the tense situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					Availing itself of this opportunity, our party expresses full support and solidarity for the WPK and the Korean people in their just struggle to ensure security and peace of the region and defend sovereignty of the country and the dignity and honor of the nation.
					
					Our party recognizes that all measures taken by the DPRK are legitimate right for safeguarding itself.
					
					We take this opportunity to wish the WPK greater success in its efforts to build a thriving socialist nation and reunify the divided country by the Koreans themselves under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK.

articles.title: National Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Mongolia
articles.content:
National Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Mongolia
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- A national seminar on the Juche idea was held in Mongolia on Feb. 5 to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					Displayed at the venue of the seminar were pictures on his revolutionary activities.
					
					The participants laid a floral basket before his portrait that was hung on the front wall of the venue.
					
					N. Sarantuya, member of the Leadership Council of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, in a speech said that Kim Jong Il made a great contribution to the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence.
					
					Sarantuya went on:
					
					"On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction" is the work of distinguished theoretical and practical significance among many works Kim Jong Il authored in the course of developing the Juche idea.
					
					This work reflects valuable experience, lessons and concrete methods to be followed by Mongolians in their work and life.
					
					Increasing daily is the interest in the works of Kim Jong Il amid the complicated world political situation.
					
					Ch. Bayarbat, executive chairman of the Mongolian Center for the Study of Juche, noted that Kim Jong Il dedicated his whole life to the country, the revolution and the people, adding:
					
					The national power of the DPRK has been consolidated in every way thanks to his revolutionary activities, especially from 1994 to the last moments of his great life.
					
					The DPRK became a nuclear weapons state and a satellite launching state and laid a solid foundation for building an economic giant and opened a decisive phase for national reunification thanks to his Songun politics.
					
					His Songun leadership serves as a brilliant example in weathering difficult situation and converting adversity into favorable conditions.
					
					L. Khaisandai, chairman of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, expressed full support and solidarity with the DPRK in its principled stand against the U.S. and its allies which cooked up the "resolution" of the UN Security Council.
					
					A congratulatory message to the dear respected Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: RPDC defendera con firmeza su seguridad y soberania, comenta ACNC
articles.content:
RPDC defendera con firmeza su seguridad y soberania, comenta ACNC
Pyongyang, 13 de febrero (ACNC) -- Los cientificos coreanos del sector de defensa nacional realizaron con exito la tercera prueba nuclear subterranea.
					La explosion exitosa de bomba atomica poderosa, pequena y ligera posibilito a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea consolidar su disuasivo fisico con que puede repeler en el acto cualesquier maniobras agresivas de los enemigos.
					
					El fortalecimiento de nuestro disuasivo nuclear deviene una causa justa para defender la seguridad y soberania del pais y nacion, siendo una de las contramedidas practicas frente a la politica hostil anti-RPDC de Estados Unidos.
					
					En mas de medio siglo desde los principios de la decada de 1950, EE.UU. convirtio el territorio surcoreano en arsenal nuclear mas grande del Extremo Oriente y amenazo seriamente la seguridad de la RPDC con su incesante campana de guerra nuclear.
					
					Trato con desesperacion de suprimir los derechos a independencia, existencia y desarrollo de la RPDC reconocidos por el derecho internacional y causo inmensas perdidas a la construccion de economia socialista y a la mejora de la vida del pueblo en ella.
					
					Aplicando la descarada pauta de doble rasero, defiende el lanzamiento de satelite artificial de los titeres surcoreanos y cuestiona la misma labor de la RPDC con fines pacificos.
					
					Debido a la politica hostil de EE.UU., se incrementa dia tras dia el peligro de guerra en la Peninsula Coreana, lo cual vulnera la paz y la seguridad del mundo.
					
					Tales hechos demuestran claramente que el aumento del disuasivo nuclear de la RPDC es la medida mas justa para frustrar las maniobras agresivas del imperio y defender la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana, el nordeste asiatico y el resto del mundo.
					
					Ahora, el imperio y sus satelites hablan ruidosamente de la "reaccion" internacional calificando otra vez de "acto provocador" la tercera prueba nuclear subterranea de la RPDC.
					
					Aunque EE.UU. esta desesperado para atropellarla, no podra doblegar la conviccion y voluntad de los uniformados y civiles coreanos levantados unanimemente en el enfrentamiento antiyanqui.
					
					La RPDC defendera con firmeza su soberania y dignidad haciendo frente rotundo hasta el final a la politica hostil y al despotismo de EE.UU.

articles.title: Grave situacion de peninsula coreana es responsabilidad de provocadores, comenta ACNC
articles.content:
Grave situacion de peninsula coreana es responsabilidad de provocadores, comenta ACNC
Pyongyang, 13 de febrero (ACNC) -- Se amplian de manera escalonada las acciones provocativas de las fuerzas hostiles en torno al lanzamiento de satelite con fines pacificos del Estado soberano.
					Despues de adoptada la "resolucion de sancion" anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, ellas andan atareadas para crear el clima de "presion" mas dura y no vacilan ni en el abierto chantaje militar.
					
					Estados Unidos y los titeres surcoreanos hablan ruidosamente de la "medida importante" y libraron hace poco en el Mar Este de Corea el entrenamiento naval conjunto. En esta maniobra, se movilizaron el crucero Aegis, el submarino nuclear norteamericano "San Francisco" equipado con misiles cruceros Tomahawk, mas de 10 buques de guerra y aviones de patrulla antisubmarinos del ejercito titere surcoreano.
					
					"San Francisco" arribo a las aguas maritimas del Sur de Corea a los 19 anos desde 1994 cuando la RPDC y EE.UU. estuvieron en agudo enfrentamiento. Este hecho demuestra claramente la belicosidad de las fuerzas hostiles deseosas de llevar otra vez a la fase peligrosa la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Los belicistas abogan por la "reaccion mas fuerte" diciendo que el "entrenamiento conjunto no es suficiente para doblegar la intencion provocativa del Norte (de Corea)".
					
					Para atacar el campo de prueba nuclear y las instalaciones militares de la RPDC, el imperio emplazo en la isla Guam 2 cazabombarderos Stealth B-2, que se encontraban en su territorio, mientras los titeres surcoreanos se enfrascan en el desarrollo temprano de los misiles balisticas con un alcance de 800km.
					
					Esos movimientos son un desafio frontal a la sociedad internacional, que se preocupa de la grave situacion politico-militar que se crea ahora en la Peninsula Coreana, y abierto acto agresivo para derrumbar a la RPDC.
					
					Como muestran los hechos, la causa de la grave situacion no reside en el lanzamiento de satelite artificial pacifico.
					
					Ella esta en la politica hostil y de guerra de las fuerzas belicistas que hablan hasta de la contramedida militar cuestionando el legitimo derecho de un Estado soberano al desarrollo espacial con fines pacificos.
					
					Las fuerzas hostiles vinieron considerando hasta la fecha a la RPDC, que avanza con toda firmeza por el camino de independencia sin arrodillarse, como una espina atravesada en su garganta y nunca han renunciado su intento de derrumbarla.
					
					Los actos hostiles, que se cometen pretextando el lanzamiento de satelite artificial, forman parte de la campana de represion anti-RPDC que prosigue de siglo en siglo.
					
					Para disimular su politica de guerra, las fuerzas hostiles describen como "creacion de tensa situacion" el lanzamiento de satelite por parte de la RPDC imputandole la "responsabilidad por la carrera armamentista regional".
					
					La situacion de la Peninsula Coreana de hoy llego al estado tan delicado que puede dar lugar a la guerra total por cualquier pequeno incidente accidental.
					
					Los provocadores deben actuar con prudencia.
					
					El ejercito y pueblo coreanos estan dispuestos a defender la soberania y la dignidad del pais frustrando los brutales desafios de las fuerzas hostiles.
					
					Si esas fuerzas siguen actuando como ahora interpretando mal la voluntad de la RPDC de defender su soberania, tendran que probar la contramedida inimaginablemente fuerte.
					
					Los provocadores se responsabilizaran totalmente de las consecuencias.

articles.title: ACNC publica comentario sobre tercera prueba nuclear subterranea
articles.content:
ACNC publica comentario sobre tercera prueba nuclear subterranea
Pyongyang, 13 de febrero (ACNC) -- La tercera prueba nuclear subterranea, realizada el dia 12 por la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, forma parte de las contramedidas practicas frente a la politica hostil y la arbitrariedad de Estados Unidos contra la RPDC.
					Como en el caso de las hostilidades que prosiguen de siglo en siglo, la acusacion de EE.UU. contra la RPDC en el tema de lanzamiento de la unidad no.2 del satelite artificial "Kwangmyongsong-3" llevo a la fase de explosion la indignacion del ejercito y pueblo de la RPDC.
					
					Segun la logica del imperio, la RPDC no tiene derecho a lanzar el satelite artificial, lo que hacen normalmente otros paises. Esto constituye el peor insulto y burla al pueblo coreano.
					
					Puesto que EE.UU. expuso su malsana intencion de exacerbar la situacion con su logica de bandido, la RPDC le advirtio que no indujera la situacion por el camino no deseado por nadie con la reaccion extremadamente hostil, aprendiendo la leccion de haber obligado a la segunda en abril pasado a revisar totalmente el problema nuclear.
					
					Sin embargo, EE.UU. no hizo caso, por el contrario, instigo al Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU a aprobar la "resolucion", que estipula la "sancion" y las "medidas importantes" anti-RPDC negando sin motivos justos el derecho de esta al lanzamiento de satelite, y se puso al frente de su implementacion.
					
					La "resolucion" no. 2087 del CS es documento criminal del terrorismo de Estado que niega no solo el derecho al desarrollo del pueblo coreano sino hasta la autodeterminacion y el derecho a la vida.
					
					EE.UU. promueve la colaboracion internacional para aplastar a la RPDC, mientras exacerba la situacion desplegando en la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno un sinnumero de medios de ataque nuclear y realizando el simulacro de ataque preventivo contra la segunda.
					
					La arbitrariedad del imperio hizo reventar el acumulado animo antiyanqui de los militares y habitantes coreanos.
					
					No podemos vivir mas en la escasez economica por culpa de los yanquis. Ajustemos las cuentas con ellos para defender la soberania de la nacion y lograr el triunfo final. Mostremos a los yanquis, que nos desprecian, el temperamento de la nacion coreana, asi reclaman los habitantes y militares coreanos.
					
					La tercera prueba nuclear subterranea, primera contramedida tomada con el maximo autocontrol, constituye la demostracion fisica de las excelentes especificaciones del diversificado, minimizado y aligerado disuasivo nuclear de la RPDC.
					
					Conoceran bien su poder explosivo y nivel los mismos enemigos que observaron la prueba.
					
					Nadie tiene derecho a criticar la presente prueba nuclear, legitima medida autodefensiva que conviene totalmente a la Carta de la ONU.
					
					El disuasivo nuclear de la RPDC es el medio de justicia para defender la soberania y la dignidad frustrando el despotismo y la arbitrariedad  de los imperialistas.
					
					Poner en practica o no la segunda y tercera medidas intransigentes depende enteramente de la opcion posterior de EE.UU. 
					
					EE.UU. debe reconocer su error y corregirlo.
					
					En el caso de que EE.UU. vuelva a subestimar la advertencia de la RPDC, los militares y habitantes coreanos no perderan nunca esa oportunidad historica.

articles.title: "Reequilibrio" de Asia-Pacifico es teoria de aumento armamentista, insiste Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
"Reequilibrio" de Asia-Pacifico es teoria de aumento armamentista, insiste Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 13 de febrero (ACNC) -- Se torna mas peligroso el movimiento de Estados Unidos en la region de Asia-Pacifico bajo el rotulo de "reequilibrio". 
					El "reequilibrio" de que habla tanto el imperio es precisamente la doctrina de aumento armamentista. 
					
					La estrategia norteamericana de dar importancia al Asia-Pacifico tropieza con una resistencia de los pueblos de la region. 
					
					En tal circunstancia, EE.UU. predica como si la paz de la region dependiera del "reequilibrio" con el fin de que la lucha de ellos por la paz no se dirija a rechazar la politica de guerra de si mismo.
					
					Ademas, tiene el objetivo de formar la red de cerco militar sobre los paises regionales. 
					
					EE.UU. intenta asestar el golpe preventivo contra la RPDC, arrodillarla con la agresion y guerra y derrocar el socialismo coreano.
					
					Hasta la fecha se ha prevenido la guerra en la region de Asia-Pacifico no por el "equilibrio" por las fuerzas armadas agresoras norteamericanas, sino por el fuerte disuasivo de guerra y la tenaz lucha de la RPDC contra la guerra y por la defensa de la paz. 
					
					Previendo la situacion como ahora, la RPDC opto por el Songun ya hace mucho tiempo y lo mantiene invariablemente.
					
					Por lo tanto, es una ilusion vana el intento de los belicistas norteamericanos de derrocar a la RPDC.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena penas impuestas a Ro Su Hui
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena penas impuestas a Ro Su Hui
Pyongyang, 13 de febrero (ACNC) -- El pasado dia 8, la banda del traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak abrio el juicio publico sobre el vicepresidente de la direccion surena de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria (APRP), Ro Su Hui, quien habia visitado a Pyongyang para expresar condolencias por el gran duelo nacional.
					En el juicio, Ro fue condenado a 4 anos de carcel e igual periodo de suspension de calificacion.
					
					El diario Rodong Sinmun senala en un comentario individual difundido este miercoles que esa sentencia es otra barbaridad de los traidores al pais y la nacion y los verdugos fascistas anti-reunificacion, habituados al enfrentamiento fratricida y a la violacion de derechos humanos, y continua:
					
					Ademas, constituye otro desafio frontal a la RPDC.
					
					La banda de Lee Myung Bak condena a duras penas a Ro Su Hui y otros miembros de las entidades del movimiento por la reunificacion quienes realizaron justas actividades por la reconciliacion y unidad de la nacion y la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Al crear el horrible clima de represion en el Sur de Corea, ella trata de frenar la creciente voluntad de habitantes surcoreanos de reunificar el pais en alianza con el Norte y de realizar su ambicion de agredir a la RPDC sembrando la conciencia conflictiva con esta.
					
					Los compinches de Lee, que cayeron en el abismo de arruinamiento por sus imperdonables crimenes anti-reunificacion cometidos ante la nacion, buscan su salida en la campana de enfrentamiento y guerra anti-RPDC y en la represion demencial contra las fuerzas progresistas.
					
					En virtud de la infame y fascista "ley de seguridad", reprime y ejecuta a las personalidades patrioticas que trabajaron con abnegacion por la reconciliacion y la reunificacion de la nacion.
					
					La nacion coreana castigara severamente a esa horda de bribones y enemigos de la nacion.
